శ్రీ లలితే! నమోస్తుతే!

లలితాసహస్రనామల గొప్పదనం…! పారాయణ ఫలం సంపూర్ణం గా దక్కాలంటే ఎo చెయ్యలి, ఎలా చెయ్యలి…?

Sri Lalitae! Namostutae!

To get the complete benefit of ‘parayanam’, watch the video to know the exact procedure. The greatness and divinity of Lalita Sahasranaamam…!

    Ayya neenu Mee yokka SRI LALITHA NAMOSTHUTHEE Vedios ni choodaali antee alaaga, meeru aa Vedios ni maaku as vidham gaa Ana andhincha galaraa. Neenu almost every episode chusaanu, raasukunnanu, kaani chaala miss ayyanu. Meemu konukkovaali ante konukkuntaamu drive lo Patti choosukuntaamu.
    Okay doubt vundhi naama vibjajana lo…920 nundi 930 namaalu madhyalo chappar….dakshina,dakshinaaraadhyaa….next kaulini keval ki Kani anarghya kaivalyapadadayini…ki breakage chapparu….as roju miss ayyanu. Guruvugariki request maathramee.

  5. subha
    May 10, 2016

    Leave a Reply

    Nenu na 10 taragati chaduvutunna samayanike naku, lalitha sahasranamalu notiki kanthata vachhunu. Kani vati arthalu naku purthiga teliyavu. Naku telisindi okkate, aa jaganmatanu chusi ananda padi povadam. Ye badha vachhina amma mundu yedavadam. Yippudu nenu gruhininil. Oka Babu, oka Papa. Babu ku 5 samvatsarala lopu, yenno debbalu tagilayi , amma daya valana taggayi. Oka roju meeru lalitha sahasra nama , phalastuti gurinchi chebutu, lalitha sahasra namalanu, rojuki okkasari chadivite chalu, ayite, aa chadavadam vudayam 5.30 Am lopu ayipovalani chepparu. (Bharati jihvagra ganye , nrutyati nityasaha;)
    Nenu ade vidhamga oka 15 rojulu padyami nunchi powrnami varaku, pratiroju 4.00Am ki lechi, snana aadulu muginchi, prasadanni tayaru chesi, lalitha sahasra namalanu chadivanu.
    15 rojulu avutune maa variki Department of Atomic Energy (BARC) lo scientist ga (mundara Orissa lo vunde vallam)
    job vochindi. Asalu ma varu apply chesindi visakhapatnam kosam. Kani appointment dorikindi, Kancheepuram Dist. lo.
    Na aanandani avadhulu levu. Ammavari padala meeda padi, anandasruvalato , ammaku, namaskaralu cheppukunnanu. Nenu Brahmarla yintlo puttanu. Sangeetam nerchukonnanu. Aa nerchu konna krutulato yippudu anukshanam aa Kamakshi devi ni koluchu kontunnanu. Mee margadarsakam valana , kamakshi anugrahanni pondanu.
    Yippudu pillalaku debbalu levu, naku KV lo job ochhindi. School pani, yinti pani, pillala panulu vunna , manasuki santhi ga vundi.
    Aa jaganmata paripoorna anugrahaniki naku dari cheppandi.
    Namaskaram “Guruvu Garu”
